PostgreSQL Connector¶

This module builds the connection to the PostgreSQL database hosted remotely by Heroku. It provides methods to write and read data to and from the database respectively.

utils.SQL_connector.readDataFromSQL()¶

Read data from database and store it into a Pandas data frame. :return: Pandas data frame with data currently stored in SQL database.

utils.SQL_connector.writeDataToSQL(pd_dataframe)¶

Write data from data frame to the remote SQL database. :param pd_dataframe: Pandas data frame with new data to write to SQL database. :return: None
